verses.verse: Gather yourselves together, <S%H7197><s%> yes, <S%H7197><s%> gather together, you nation <S%H1471><s%> that has no shame, <S%H3700><s%>

before the appointed <S%H2706><s%> time <S%H3205><s%> when the day <S%H3117><s%> passes <S%H5674><s%> as the chaff, <S%H4671><s%> before <S%H3808><s%> the fierce <S%H2740><s%> anger <S%H639><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> comes <S%H935><s%> on you, <S%H3117><s%> before the day of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s anger <S%H639><s%> comes on you. <S%H935><s%>

Seek <S%H1245><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> all you humble <S%H6035><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> who have kept <S%H6466><s%> his ordinances. <S%H4941><s%> Seek <S%H1245><s%> righteousness. <S%H6664><s%> Seek <S%H1245><s%> humility. <S%H6038><s%> It may be <S%H194><s%> that you will be hidden <S%H5641><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s anger. <S%H639><s%>

For Gaza <S%H5804><s%> will be forsaken, <S%H5800><s%> and Ashkelon <S%H831><s%> a desolation. <S%H8077><s%> They will drive out <S%H1644><s%> Ashdod <S%H795><s%> at noonday, <S%H6672><s%> and Ekron <S%H6138><s%> will be rooted up. <S%H6131><s%>

Woe <S%H1945><s%> to the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> coast, <S%H2256><s%> the nation <S%H1471><s%> of the Cherethites! <S%H3774><s%> The word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is against you, <S%H3667><s%> Canaan, the land <S%H776><s%> of the Philistines. <S%H6430><s%> I will destroy <S%H6><s%> you, <S%H3427><s%> that there will be no inhabitant.
The sea <S%H3220><s%> coast <S%H2256><s%> will be pastures, <S%H5116><s%> with cottages <S%H3741><s%> for shepherds <S%H7462><s%> and folds <S%H1448><s%> for flocks. <S%H6629><s%>

The coast <S%H2256><s%> will be for the remnant <S%H7611><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah. <S%H3063><s%> They will find pasture. <S%H7462><s%> In the houses <S%H1004><s%> of Ashkelon, <S%H831><s%> they will lie down <S%H7257><s%> in the evening, <S%H6153><s%> for Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> their God, <S%H430><s%> will visit <S%H6485><s%> them, <S%H7725><s%> and restore them. <S%H7622><s%>

I have heard <S%H8085><s%> the reproach <S%H2781><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> and the insults <S%H2781><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon, <S%H5983><s%> with which they have reproached <S%H2778><s%> my people, <S%H5971><s%> and magnified <S%H1431><s%> themselves against their border. <S%H1366><s%>

Therefore as I live, <S%H2416><s%> says <S%H5002><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies, <S%H6635><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> surely Moab <S%H4124><s%> will be as Sodom, <S%H5467><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> as Gomorrah, <S%H6017><s%> a possession <S%H4476><s%> of nettles, <S%H2738><s%> and salt pits, <S%H4379><s%> and a perpetual <S%H5704><s%> desolation. <S%H8077><s%> The remnant <S%H7611><s%> of my people <S%H5971><s%> will plunder <S%H962><s%> them, <S%H3499><s%> and the survivors of my nation <S%H1471><s%> will inherit them. <S%H5157><s%>

This they will have for their pride, <S%H1347><s%> because they have reproached <S%H2778><s%> and magnified <S%H1431><s%> themselves against the people <S%H5971><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies. <S%H6635><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will be awesome <S%H3372><s%> to them, <S%H7329><s%> for he will famish all the gods <S%H430><s%> of the land. <S%H776><s%> Men will worship <S%H7812><s%> him, <S%H376><s%> everyone from his place, <S%H4725><s%> even all the shores <S%H339><s%> of the nations. <S%H1471><s%>
You <S%H1992><s%> Cushites also, <S%H1992><s%> you will be killed <S%H2491><s%> by my sword. <S%H2719><s%>

He will stretch out <S%H5186><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> against the north, <S%H6828><s%> destroy <S%H6><s%> Assyria, <S%H804><s%> and will make <S%H7760><s%> Nineveh <S%H5210><s%> a desolation, <S%H8077><s%> as dry <S%H6723><s%> as the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>

Herds <S%H5739><s%> will lie down <S%H7257><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of her, <S%H2416><s%> all the animals of the nations. <S%H1471><s%> Both the pelican <S%H6893><s%> and the porcupine <S%H7090><s%> will lodge <S%H3885><s%> in its capitals. <S%H3730><s%> Their calls <S%H6963><s%> will echo <S%H7891><s%> through the windows. <S%H2474><s%> Desolation <S%H2721><s%> will be in the thresholds, <S%H5592><s%> for he has laid bare <S%H6168><s%> the cedar beams. <S%H731><s%>

This is the joyous <S%H5947><s%> city <S%H5892><s%> that lived <S%H3427><s%> carelessly, <S%H983><s%> that said <S%H559><s%> in her heart, <S%H3824><s%> "I am, <S%H657><s%> and there is none besides me. <S%H8047><s%>" How she has become a desolation, a place for animals <S%H2416><s%> to lie down in! <S%H4769><s%> Everyone who passes by <S%H5674><s%> her will hiss, <S%H8319><s%> and shake <S%H5128><s%> their fists. <S%H3027><s%>
